bug.author: eashtianjr
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.0/api_docs/python/tf/estimator/VocabInfo>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.0/api_docs/python/tf/estimator/VocabInfo</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Clear description</denchmark-h>
This API Documentation does not state when or when not to use this symbol. The description lacks details specific to the desired use case. <denchmark-h:h3>Correct links</denchmark-h>
The link to the source code is correct. <denchmark-h:h3>Parameters defined</denchmark-h>
All of the parameters are defined and formatted correctly. <denchmark-h:h3>Returns defined</denchmark-h>
Return values are not defined. <denchmark-h:h3>Raises listed and defined</denchmark-h>
Errors are not defined. <denchmark-h:h3>Usage example</denchmark-h>
The API Symbol also doesn't contain well-documented code sample(s). The current code samples provided are missing concise explanations. For example, why would you use the different backup initializers or invocations? <denchmark-h:h3>Request visuals, if applicable</denchmark-h>
No visuals specified. <denchmark-h:h3>Submit a pull request?</denchmark-h>
Yes, I've created a pull request. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/29520>#29520</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Can you please help us to reference corresponding PR raised on master branch. Thanks!
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/achandraa>@achandraa</denchmark-link> I've updated the pull request to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/29520>#29520</denchmark-link>
Closing the issue since PR is merged to master. Thanks!
